title: WPFWDr. David Lewis
content:
The case against medical/corporate/political science for scientific misconduct regarding the MMR vaccine â€“ exonerating... <!--more--> Drs Walker-Smith and Wakefield..
and further corruption in the CDC and FDA Dr David Lewis is an internationally recognized research microbiologist and a former senior research microbiologist with the US Environmental Protection Agency.
He is the only EPA scientist to have published first-authored research articles in Nature, Lancet and Nature Medicine.
Among his better known scientific discoveries is the use of DNA fingerprinting to study effects of climate change on the breakdown of pesticides by bacteria, the standardization of heat sterilization of dental equipment worldwide, and the dangers of sewage sludge farming that led to the EPA to discontinue its use.
It was this latter research that was leading to death related incidents of sewage agriculture that led to his removal a the agency and his subsequent whistleblowing.
He is now a senior science advisor for the National Whistleblowers Center in Washington DC and a member of its Board and focusing on institutional misconduct and corruption the federal and private health industry.
